plays.text: Goal scored by Steve McCarthy unassisted
Penalty to Sergei Berezin 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Stan Neckar
Penalty to Kyle Calder 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Steve Thomas
Penalty to Eric Daze 2 minutes for Holding Ruslan Fedotenko
Goal scored by Martin St. Louis assisted by Vincent Lecavalier and Brad Richards
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Boarding Steve McCarthy
Penalty to Jocelyn Thibault 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Steve Thomas
Penalty to Pavel Kubina 2 minutes for Hooking Nathan Dempsey
Penalty to Ben Clymer 2 minutes for Boarding Nathan Dempsey
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Phil Housley and Alexei Zhamnov
Goal scored by Igor Korolev unassisted
2 minute Bench Penalty for Unsportsmanlike Conduct - Coach served by Brad Lukowich
Penalty to Brad Richards 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified) served by Brad Lukowich
